page.title: 16Nursery Unit
page.content:
The{Nursery}has got spades, buckets etc. The best thing there is the wood work things because you can buy saws and hammers and nails. I could not use them when I was little because they are dangerous. The most dangerous thing there is {sand pit}because the sand can get in peoples' eyes. My cousin goes to the nursery unit, he is 3 years old. He lives in Callington, down the road from us.
There are some{plastic building {blocks}that they play with and kick down. They have got a{play kitchen}and also a real one. My cousins favourite subject is painting because it is messy and hot, absorbing and interesting.
